Abstract:
This package for &GAP; 4 (at least version 4.4) provides routines for computing with Residue Class-Wise Affine mappings (in short rcwa-mappings) of the ring \Z and its semilocalizations \Z_{(\pi)} as well as of the polynomial rings GF( q )[ x ]. In particular it can be used for computations involving bijective such mappings and infinite permutation groups generated by them.
It is completely written in the &GAP; language and neither contains nor requires external binaries.
The package &ResClasses; is needed for dealing with set-theoretic unions of residue classes, and the package GRAPE is needed for dealing with certain graphs we associate to rcwa mappings.
For the documentation the package &GAPDoc; is needed.
&RCWA; must be installed in the pkg subdirectory of the &GAP; distribution.
